desc: The flashing light is meant to signal that there's been some sort of emergency...
name: Alert Light

desc: Ouch! I shouldn't get too close to that.
name: Barbed Wire

desc: __no description__
name: Basic Bath

desc: __no description__
name: Dripping Basic Bath

desc: A normal looking toilet! Thank the stars!
name: Basic Toilet

desc: A television! I don't think this has worked for a long time.
name: Old Television

desc: The amount of data on this screen is overwhelming.
name: Large Monitor

desc: There's a book in here titled, 'How to Travel Backwards in Time for Dummies'.
name: Metal Bookcase

desc: It looks like it's full of hazardous materials.
name: Metal Cabinet

desc: A metallic ceiling lamp.
name: Metal Ceiling Lamp

desc: A metallic ceiling lamp.
name: Metal Ceiling Lamp

desc: Looks like it's mainly used for data entry. Nothing too interesting.
name: Small Computer

desc: It's full of really tempting levers but I should probably leave it alone.
name: Command Console

desc: Two keyboards and one monitor?
name: Large Console

desc: It looks like a screen full of personnel memos.
name: Small Console

desc: It's a screen full of super top secret mission data... Boring.
name: Wide Console

desc: A support beam painted with cautionary stripes. Mind your head!
name: Metal Support Beam

desc: A metal crate.
name: Metal Crate

desc: An office desk with a built-in monitor. Looks like someone was doing some coding.
name: Metal Office Desk

desc: The display shows a round central room branching off into several hallways.
name: Blueprint Display

desc: A screen with a pie chart representing budget statistics.
name: Statistical Display

desc: It's a map displaying a round central room branching out into several corridors.
name: Map Display

desc: That's no moon...
name: Anomalous Display

desc: A device to scan eyeballs and match them to personnel data.
name: Eye Scanner

desc: It scans fingerprints and matches them to personnel data.
name: Fingerprint Scanner

desc: A space heater!
name: Space Heater

desc: A blindingly bright fluorescent light.
name: Wide Fluorescent Lamp

desc: A blindingly bright fluorescent light.
name: Tall Fluorescent Lamp

desc: Stay still! It can't see you if you stay still.
name: Motion Detector

desc: This appears to be an analysis of the environment outside of the bunker.
name: Environmental Data Panel

desc: It's a patient file. He appears to be human, but... with two hearts?
name: Medical Data Panel

desc: A flashy electronic recruitment poster.
name: LED Recruitment Panel

desc: That's not very encouraging.
name: Motivational Poster

desc: There is no need to be upset.
name: Calming Poster

desc: It's a large server cabinet.
name: Server Cabinet

desc: This sliding door makes me feel like I'm in a sci-fi game...
name: Modern Sliding Door

desc: A simple metal table.
name: Metal Table

desc: A solid metal table.
name: Solid Metal Table

desc: Ideal for laying out battle strategies, holding meetings and snacking.
name: Large Metal Table

desc: A monitor displaying a task list.
name: Small Wall Monitor

desc: A set of three TV monitors facing in different directions.'
name: USCM Television Monitors

desc: Sterile, recycled air whirs through the fanblades at a steady pace.
name: Bunker Vent

desc: This is just an electrical fire waiting to happen.
name: Wires

desc: Someone couldn't count to 25.
name: Tally Marks

desc: This looks like a nice place to hide.
name: Curtain

desc: The sign says "DANGER". Wait, how do these people know my middle name?
name: Horizontal Danger Sign

desc: The sign says "DANGER". Wait, how do these people know my middle name?
name: Vertical Danger Sign

desc: Perfect for storing a lot of food and keeping it fresh.
name: Full-Size Fridge

desc: A shiny glass panel.
name: Glass Panel

desc: This brightly coloured tape clearly indicates that the area is unsafe.
name: Horizontal Hazard Tape

desc: This brightly coloured tape clearly indicates that the area is unsafe.
name: Vertical Hazard Tape

desc: A nice, spacious, wall-mounted storage solution.
name: Human Storage Locker

desc: This jukebox sounds great! Too bad there only seems to be one track.
name: Jukebox

desc: It's entrancing. I can't look away.
name: Lava Lamp

desc: What does USCM stand for, again? Oh - United Systems Colonial Marines.
name: USCM Sign

desc: Nuke all the foods!
name: Microwave

desc: It's been so long since I had a home cooked meal... or a home.
name: Basic Oven

desc: An ornate gothic arch.
name: Gothic Arch

desc: Fire in a rusted-out barrel.
name: Barrel Fire

desc: Thick metal bars surround each cell. Chance of escape seems pretty slim.
name: Prison Bars

desc: A cold, hard slab of metal meant to serve as a bed.
name: Chained Metal Bed

desc: A simple bench, save for the fact that the legs are nailed to the floor.
name: Metal Bench

desc: Looks like it used to be filled with medical supplies - not any more.
name: Broken Supply Cabinet

desc: A set of monitors displaying the feeds from security cameras. Watch out for paranormal activity.
name: Security Camera Station

desc: A control panel that appears to operate lights, doors and alarms.
name: Security Control Panel

desc: A decorative gothic corner.
name: Decorative Support Beam

desc: A door made of thick metal bars.
name: Barred Door

desc: If you go this way, you're sure to be exiting... something.
name: Exit Sign

desc: It's a chain-link fence.
name: Tall Chain-link Fence

desc: It's a chain-link fence.
name: Short Chain-link Fence

desc: There were some office supplies and inmate files in this filing cabinet.
name: Rusty Filing Cabinet

desc: There were some office supplies and inmate files in this filing cabinet.
name: Wide Rusty Filing Cabinet

desc: It feels like I'm on stage!
name: Small Floodlight

desc: A flickering light to set that creepy mood.
name: Small Broken Floodlight

desc: Some sort of solitary confinement device, maybe?
name: Force Cell

desc: Rusty old girder beams - can't be too safe.
name: Horizontal Rusted Girder

desc: Rusty old girder beams - can't be too safe.
name: Vertical Rusted Girder

desc: Waz.
name: 'Waz' Graffiti

desc: Sure seems that way, Anonymous Graffiti Artist.
name: "No Escape" Graffiti

desc: Graffiti. A harsh warning. Ignore it.
name: Graffiti

desc: A crudely-drawn skull. It looks cheerful.
name: Graffiti

desc: Graffiti. The writer seems somewhat peeved.
name: Graffiti

desc: Graffiti reading "turn back". Chances of it being adhered to: zero.
name: Graffiti

desc: The words "get out" have been written in blood. You can tell the writer was serious.
name: Graffiti

desc: Rusted metal grates meant for ventilation.
name: Horizonal Metal Grates

desc: Rusted metal grates meant for ventilation.
name: Vertical Metal Grates

desc: A good place to stash contraband.
name: Small Prison Locker

desc: A good place to stash contraband.
name: Tall Prison Locker

desc: This mattress is filthy! I swear I just saw something crawling around inside.
name: Dirty Mattress

desc: Looks like someone had a case of the Mondays.
name: Large Broken Mirror

desc: Looks like someone had a case of the Mondays.
name: Small Broken Mirror

desc: The panel displays information about interacting with prisoners...
name: USCM Penal Colony Panel

desc: A notice written in ink.
name: Notice

desc: The paper is ripped and the words are smudged.
name: USCM Torn Memo

desc: Inmate #2162's Study Group for Criminals Who Can't Read Good
name: Event Memo

desc: A fence fashioned out of heavy metal pipes.
name: Pipe Fence

desc: The space heater emits a low, unpleasant hum.
name: Old Radiator

desc: A security camera. An all-seeing eye.
name: Security Camera

desc: A shower. Perfect for a clean getaway. If the water was actually clean.
name: Rusty Shower

desc: A shower. Perfect for a clean getaway.
name: Dripping Prison Shower

desc: The sign says, "Cell Block".
name: Cell Block Sign

desc: The sign says, "Mess Hall".
name: Mess Hall Sign

desc: USCM, huh? I wouldn't wanna be one of their prisoners.
name: USCM Penal Colony Sign

desc: Just a typical cafeteria table.
name: Cafeteria Table

desc: Looks like someone had a rough night.
name: Dirty Toilet

desc: A torture bed. Terrifying! Thank goodness for the pillow.
name: Upright Torture Bed

desc: A torture bed. Terrifying! Thank goodness for the pillow.
name: Torture Bed

desc: It's a turbine. Y'know, for science.
name: Small Turbine

desc: Ooh, what should I get?
name: Vending Machine

desc: It's one of those drinking machines people use to make small-talk.
name: Water Cooler
